TopicTitle: EJ_SA's most recent stream pics: Hadfield station - 2600 parts docked

Articles.Content:
AGAIN I do not take credit for this it is all EJ_SA's work in this video. He said he didn't care where the pictures go so I'm sharing it with all of you!

Enjoy CTS-15, CTS-16, and Tugbert all docked with hadfield station:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

P.S. Yes I know Wackjob builds bigger but still. 2 shuttles! And Tugbert!
Good name...Hadfield ftw!!
Impressive. That would send my laptop into crying fits and I imagine even he still has lag issues. Pretty cool to see the two shuttles docked.
Impressive is the word. My computer would kill me in my sleep if I inflicted that on it.

He was chugging pretty bad. I think Yarg said it was like four minutes real time for something like 30 seconds in game idk what it was but it was around there. He was able to dock the 2nd shuttle without too much difficulty.
How is performance while this thing is loaded?

This is actually pretty small for ej_sa

His last station from what I recall was so huge it took like 5-10mins just to load the thing.

His stuff is really cool but I stopped watching him back when he was still using the Baikal shuttle because each stream was just the same shuttle being launched over and over for like an hour at a time

This is actually pretty small for ej_sa

His last station from what I recall was so huge it took like 5-10mins just to load the thing.

If you watch the video he was saying "My poor computer!" and other things like it. He and yarg where kinda worried at the 2600 part count so that's considerably over his usual count
And you can click the pictures at 15 seconds apart and it will be just like in the game!
I'm guessing over half of those parts are the shuttles alone.
